abstract: Exelon, the electric company based in Chicago, will promise to cut greenhouse gas emissions by 2020 by an amount larger than its total emissions in 2008.
snippet: Exelon, the electric company based in Chicago, will promise to cut greenhouse gas emissions by 2020 by an amount larger than its total emissions in 2008.
lead_paragraph: Exelon, the electric company based in Chicago, will promise on Tuesday to cut greenhouse gas emissions by 2020 by an amount larger than its total emissions in 2008, in a bid to shape the debate on carbon dioxide rules and to get a jump on compliance.

headline.main: To Set Tone, Exelon Plans Huge Cut in Emissions
headline.print_headline: To Set Tone, Exelon Plans Huge Cut In Emissions
